WWWCODA ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; COPIEREN DATENSATZDEFINITION ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 20-Nov-2007 GRF Doco ; 23.09.1998 DT Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- QUIT:VORG(1)="" ;KOPIE VON ;copy QUIT:VORG(2)="" ;KOPIE NACH ;copy within
SET VORG(2)=$$^WWWUMLAU(VORG(2),6) IF $DATA(^WWW001(0,VORG(2))) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32292)) QUIT ;BITTE PRÃœFUNG ;please check DO UMS SET YI="" DO . NEW YBACK,YKEY . SET YBACK="" . SET YI=YAKTION_"EP=WWWFORM&YFORM=WWW001&YKEY="_VORG(2) . DO VAR^WWWCGI
DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(30013)_": "_VORG(2),0,YI) ; "Transfer Finished:" ;SET VORG(1)="WWW002;WWW003" DO ^WWWSORT QUIT
UMS ;COPY ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; ; Inputs: ; ; ByRef: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 17-May-2007 Karine BR014527:Added WWW001Hook to the List of classes to be copied ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- MERGE ^WWW001(0,VORG(2))=^WWW001(0,VORG(1)) DO ^WWWSSORT("WWW001",VORG(2)) MERGE ^WWW0011(0,VORG(2))=^WWW0011(0,VORG(1)) DO ^WWWSSORT("WWW0011",VORG(2)) MERGE ^WWW0021(0,VORG(2))=^WWW0021(0,VORG(1)) DO ^WWWSSORT("WWW0021",VORG(2)) MERGE ^WWW002(0,VORG(2))=^WWW002(0,VORG(1)) DO ^WWWSSORT("WWW002",VORG(2)) MERGE ^WWW003(0,VORG(2))=^WWW003(0,VORG(1)) DO ^WWWSSORT("WWW003",VORG(2)) MERGE ^WWW0031(0,VORG(2))=^WWW0031(0,VORG(1)) DO ^WWWSSORT("WWW0031",VORG(2)) ;BR014527 MERGE ^WWW001Hook(0,VORG(2))=^WWW001Hook(0,VORG(1)) DO ^WWWSSORT("WWW001Hook",VORG(2)) QUIT
